definition: (onom.) sound of cawing/sound of infant learning to talk/variant of 呀[ya1]

sentences.english: He set up a school for the deaf and the dumb.
sentences.chinese: 他創建了一所聾啞學校。

sentences.english: The handicapped also include deaf - mutes and some brain paralysis amentia .
sentences.chinese: 殘疾人還包括聾啞人及部分腦癱智障患者。

sentences.english: Deaf school, HanShan teach children literacy dancing.
sentences.chinese: 聾啞學校，韓珊教孩子們識字跳舞。

sentences.english: Deaf children, mostly into learning sign language and writing deaf-mute began to grasp.
sentences.chinese: 聾啞兒童大都入了學，聾啞人開始掌握手語和書面語。

sentences.english: Deaf children, mostly into learning sign language and writing deaf-mute began to grasp.
sentences.chinese: 聾啞兒童大都入了學，聾啞人開始掌握手語和書面語。

sentences.english: HanShan pain to deaf school, watching loitered simple beloved children.
sentences.chinese: 韓珊痛苦地躑躅到聾啞學校，看着單純心愛的孩子們。

sentences.english: The new acupuncture treatment has opened up the forbidden zone of deaf-muteness and has cured many" incurable" diseases.
sentences.chinese: 新針療法打開了聾啞禁區，治癒了多種“不治之症”。

sentences.english: Afer one year of hard study, the kids will face the term examination which will begin this afternoon and last to next Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 我的聾啞學生們在辛苦學習了一年後，即將面臨考試。

sentences.english: One can better communicate with deaf-mutes with good sign language.
sentences.chinese: 掌握好手勢語可以更好地和聾啞人交流。

sentences.english: Conclusion The optical reaction time of deaf-mute children was slower than that of normal ones.
sentences.chinese: 結論聾啞兒童視覺反應時慢於正常兒童。

sentences.english: To investigate the prevalence rate and the related factors of the deaf-mute student's malocclusion in Xiamen, China.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解廈門地區聾啞學生錯畸形的患病情況及相關因素。

sentences.english: Since then I have paid special attention to those who look like deaf mutes.
sentences.chinese: 從此，我就特別注意聾啞人的特徵。

sentences.english: Helen spoke about the deaf and blind.
sentences.chinese: 海倫談論聾啞人和盲人。

sentences.english: Years ago such people were called deaf-mutes.
sentences.chinese: 幾年前，我們稱這些人爲聾啞人。

sentences.english: The researchers were particularly stunned by this activity in the planum temporale among the deaf.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員對聾啞人顳平面的這個活動感到特別驚訝。

definition: to attend to the needs of (an invalid, disabled person etc)/caregiver
excelling both in morals and studies (idiom); top marks for studies and for behavior (at school)/a paragon of virtue and learning
Huwei town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
(Tw) intellectually impaired child or youth (affectionate term)
benevolent heart and skillful execution (idiom, from Mencius); charitable in thought and deed
not to shrink from any crime (idiom); to commit any imaginable misdeed
to turn peril into safety (idiom); to avert a danger (esp. political or medical)
Wantan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
